    • Method Detail

      • getMarkingOfXML

        public java.util.ArrayList<ImageLayer> getMarkingOfXML(java.io.File xmlFile,
                                              java.util.ArrayList<ImageLayer> imageLayerList)
        Mediates call to TaskManager to update markings of several ImageLayers by giving as parameter a File (.xml) where from the markings are imported.
        Parameters:
        xmlFile - File which contains the markings
        imageLayerList - ArrayList of ImageLayer where markings are added
        Returns:
        ArrayList of ImageLayers where has the markings added

      • getMarkingOfXML

        public ImageLayer getMarkingOfXML(java.io.File xmlFile,
                         ImageLayer imageLayer)
        Mediates call to TaskManager to update markings of one ImageLayers by giving as parameter a File (.xml) where from the markings are imported.
        Parameters:
        xmlFile - File which contains the markings
        imageLayer - object where markings are added
        Returns:
        MarkingLayer object where has the markings added

      • addImageLayerList

        public void addImageLayerList(java.util.ArrayList<ImageLayer> iLayerList)
        Adds selected ImageLayers to InformationCenter.
        Parameters:
        iLayerList - Array of one or more ImageLayers.

      • updateSelectedImageLayerAndImage

        public void updateSelectedImageLayerAndImage(int iLayerID)
        Updates the InformationCenter and LayerVisualManager for which ImageLayer is selected and which BufferedImage object is in LayerVisualManger. Method updates the ImagePanel of GUI. This method is called always when selected (visible) ImageLayer is changed by user.
        Parameters:
        iLayerID - ID of ImageLayer that will be the selected ImageLayer (-> visible)
